attributes.action: Bring our troops home from Afganistan and Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our troops are doing a very brave job and they are to be supported but at the end of the day why are we still there in Iraq and Afganistan. The whole situation is turning into Vietman and it's about time we realised that. Why can't we see that with hindsite we shouldn't have gone in there in the first place and that mistakes were made, so rectify this before any more of our troops are killed. During the second world war, our country was at risk but now it's a different situation and is it that we are making things worse by being there.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
